name: Small Town Mines
description:
Small Town Mines is an adventure game where the player arrives to a small rural. His mission is to mine some gold for a couple of weeks from his late uncle's mines. The townspeople are not very welcoming to strangers who invade their small world. Try to survive for 12 days and keep your business to yourself!

Keys

Arrows - Control the main character

Enter - The action button that does pretty much anything

Tips

Read the intro text box carefully. It helps you get on with the game.

There's a Tip Portal left top most corner. You can go there for tips.

You should try pressing enter around things that look interesting.
